page.title: 19ASTBURY VILLAGE
page.content: Houses clustered around the village green, dominated by St. Mary's church & lying in farming area containing mixed,dairy & stock farming.A survey of the 15 houses round the green(2 are empty)shows that 6 are inhabited by retired people.The occupants of 4 others work locally,1 person is unemployed & 2 people commute.{THE {VILLAGE HALL},being extended & modernised in 1985 is the venue for the local playgroup,the Mothers Union, Women's Institute & Floral Society meetings as well as wedding receptions ,birthday parties & other social functions.{ASTBURY VILLAGE SCHOOL}1985 saw completion of a large extension & acquisition of land for a playing field.It has now a staff of 5 and 109 pupils,aged between 5-11,coming from Astbury & the whole Congleton area.
